argument.name: default_query
argument.description: Optional. The name of a saved query operation.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.QUERY_GENIE() method displays the Query Genie dialog box. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Travel Time") ptr.Query_Genie()
